snippet: Andre Greipel of Germany led a sprint to win the 13th stage of the Tour de France, and Bradley Wiggins of Britain retained the overall lead.
abstract: Andre Greipel of Germany wins the 13th stage of the Tour de France, and Bradley Wiggins of Britain retains the overall lead.
lead_paragraph: Andre Greipel of Germany led a sprint to win the 13th stage of the Tour de France, and Bradley Wiggins of Britain retained the overall lead.

headline.seo: 2012 Tour de France — Andre Greipel of Germany Wins His Third Stage
headline.main: German Wins Again; Wiggins Retains Lead
headline.print_headline: German Wins Again; Wiggins Retains Lead
